title: JUSPAY | Product Engineer Salary
content:
Education: B.Tech
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Interned at Amazon
Date of the Offer:2022
Company: Juspay
Title/Level: PE
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 14,00,000
Signing Bonus: INR 100,000
Bonus: Retention-based -> INR 100,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ~INR 16,00,000
Other details: Yearly appraisals happen ( January ), Stocks and appraisal upto 25% can be expected based on performance. But the tech stack is not really good for long term career.
